name: Andrew HINSON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Jennifer L. Hendricks, Record Coordinator, Sci-Frackville, Appellees

parties: Andrew HINSON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Jennifer L. Hendricks, Record Coordinator, Sci-Frackville, Appellees.

opinions.text:
JURISDICTIONAL REVIEW
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 7th day of October 1999, the direct appeal is quashed; the matter is treated as a petition for allowance of appeal and denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
741 A.2d 180
Andrew HINSON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Jennifer L. Hendricks, Record Coordinator, Sci-Frackville, Appellees.
No. 111 Middle District Appeal Docket 1998.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 7, 1999.
